title: Security
description: An update on the ongoing security improvements of Supabase.

articles.title: Supabase is SOC2 compliant
articles.description: Supabase is now SOC2 Type 1 compliant. Let’s dig into what that means, and explain the process we went through to get there. If you’re building a SaaS product, this blog post should provide a rough guide to getting your SOC2 certification.

products.title: Security portal
products.description: Monitor security at Supabase.

products.title: SOC 2 Document
products.description: Request the SOC 2 Type I document through the Security Portal.

products.title: DPA Document
products.description: Request Data Processing Agreement document through the Security Portal.
